description:
Mountain-ready, these gloves have an anatomically curved fit, and foam panels for extra warmth and comfort. A favourite with freeriders looking for a glove that fits handily inside a jacket sleeve. The treated cowhide is durable and provides dexterity for keeping a grip on your poles.

  • Made from supple and durable, treated cowhide leather
  • Removable liner is made of soft Bemberg polyester fleece with warm G-loft synthetic insulation
  • Ergonomic design uses pre-curved fingers for a close fit and a more comfortable grip
  • Adjustable Velcro strap with a stretchy neoprene panel at the cuff
  • Wrist leash keeps the gloves with you during those unexpected ejections
  • Carabiner for securing to clothing or a backpack
name: Hestra Fall Line Gloves - Unisex
